item.actor: Tottempudi Gopichand, Mukesh Rishi, Pradeep Rawat,

item.title: Janta Garage
item.description: Sathyam is a small workshop owner in a village. His brother, Shiva works in Hyderabad and opens a workshop for Sathyam there. The brothers and their faithful allies run the garage happily as Janatha Garage. One day, a poor man, who is a friend of Sathyam, loses his college-going daughter in a road accident. Sathyam and his friends get to know that she was raped and killed by some goons. They ask Shiva's friend ASP Chandrashekar's help, but he is helpless as there is no proper evidence against them and also they are highly influential. Then Janatha Garage take the matter in their own hands, kill the goons and make it look like an accident. Chandrasekhar knows this and warns against taking law in their hands as he is worried about the consequences.
item.actor: Mohanlal Nair, N. T. Rama Rao Jr.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Action, Janta Garage, Action Movies, Koratala Siva, Latest Movies

item.title: Double Attack 2
item.description: A low-level party cadre Sengalvarayan is tying a flag to a street-lamp post. Suddenly his pregnant wife goes into labour, but he completely ignores it, as he is more dedicated to his leader and party. At the same time, the party's deputy leader visits the locality; as soon as he comes to know about this incident, the leader lends his car and orders his driver to immediately take the pregnant lady to the hospital; she delivers a baby boy named Pazhani before they get to the hospital. At the age of fifteen, Pazhani secures first rank in his 10th standard state exam and visits the party deputy-leader, now the chairman of the party and a member of the ruling coalition for his blessings with his father. While they are waiting in the party office for the leader to come in, they witness a murder of a rebel party candidate by their own revered leader due to caste-related comments by the rebel on him. When the leader asks Sengalvarayan to take the blame by saying that he killed the man due to rage about the rebel's comments, Pazhani volunteers to take the blame and is willing to go to jail, citing the leniency of juvenile laws in exchange for an MLA seat for his father in the upcoming by-election. The deal is agreed and carried out
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Double Attack 2, Goldmines Telefilms

item.title: Krishnashtami
item.description: Krishnan, an NRI, always dreams of settling in India. When he makes a trip to India, he is attacked by a group of strangers and is determined to find the culprits.

item.title: Waarrior Savitri
item.description: Waarrior Savitri is a contemporary adaptation of the mythological romance of Savitri and Satyavan found in the Vana Parva - The Book of the Forest of the Mahabharata. The modern day Savitri is adept in martial arts and will do anything to save her husband.

item.title: Ghayal Once Again
item.description: Four teenagers accidentally record a murder on their cameras featuring two of the city's most influential people. Vigilante Ajay gets involved in helping them as they enter into a powerful battle.

item.title: The Super Khiladi 3
item.description: Viu The Super Khiladi 3, the Hindi dubbed version of Telugu Romantic Comedy Nenu Sailaja; a tale which talks about a womanizer called DJ Hari who tries his luck on every girl who comes his way. This continues till he actually falls in love with Sailaja, a damsel in distress. He attempts to get close to her but fails as she doesn’t pay him any heed. Will be able to he use his charm and intelligence to win her over? Tune in to find out!

item.title: Puli
item.description: A virtuous soldier tries to save people from an evil queen and a throne-seeking commander. The movie story deals with Maru Dheeran a meek child brought up in an enslaved village coming under the oppressive rule of the blue-eyed monstrous 'Vedalam' group who burden the people with enormous taxes and kill on whim. When his wife is kidnapped for sacrifice by the Vedalam Queen & her commander in-chief, Maru Dheeran takes a journey to their impenetrable fort in order to retrieve her and put an end to the tyranny.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Puli, Goldmines Telefilms

item.title: Rowdy Hero
item.description: Rowdy Hero is the Hindi dubbed version of the Tamil comedy blockbuster Maari. The plot talks about Maari who is a local don and had murdered another powerful goon in that area after which he took over as their head. When Arjun, a cunning cop gets transferred to the area, he tries to collect enough proof to put Maari behind the bars with the help of Sridevi who has her own reasons to hate the don. Now, Maari the goon with a large heart returns from jail, only to realize that his area is now under the control of Arjun. What happens next ?

item.title: Vedalam
item.description: Dubbed in Hindi, the Tamil Blockbuster ‘Vedalam’ circles around Ganesh, a taxi driver and his sister who try to settle down in Kolkata where she has enrolled for a course to hone her artistic skills. Unknown to his sister, Ganesh's hidden past and that of his sister comes to light when he goes up against an international human trafficking syndicate. The syndicate discovers that it’s not just a mere co incidence.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Vedalam, Goldmines Telefilms

item.title: Anek
item.description: Watch Anek, the Hindi dubbed version of Tamil Blockbuster ‘Anegan’; a tale that revolves around Madhu, a young game developer who often gets weird thoughts about her past life. The doctors call it as an illusion caused by stress at her job, while she believes it is some kind of reincarnation. To Amyra's surprise, she meets everyone in her past life including Ashwin whom she loved in her past life. Now the big question is, which part is reality and which of it is Amyra's imagination? Watch to find out!

item.title: Jil
item.description: After Chota Nayak runs away from the police custody, he decides to go in search of his enemy. He comes across Jai and believes him to be his enemy's associate. Later, he attacks Jai and troubles him.

item.title: Son of Satyamurthy
item.description: Son of Satyamurthy is a Telugu drama blockbuster, dubbed in Hindi. The plot orbits around Sathyamurthy, a billionaire businessman with great human values. Sathyamurthy dies in an accident leaving his son Viraj with a property worth 300 crores along with loans for the same amount. He has an option to go for insolvency and save 300 crores whilst living a happy life. But he foregoes 300 crores to make sure that his father’s image is not tarnished.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Son of Satyamurthy, Goldmines Telefilms, Action

item.title: Patel On Sale
item.description: Patel For Sale is the Hindi dubbed version of Subramanyam For Sale, a Telugu film, starring Sai Dharam Tej, Regina, Ajay and Adah Sharma. Patel is a money-minded youth who goes to the US to earn big bucks. He helps Seetha, who has been duped by her boyfriend and left stranded. Seetha requests Patel to come along with her to India and clear the chaos created by her elopement. Patel accepts, but his services come at a hefty price. Watch the full movie to find out what happens next!

item.title: Heart Attack
item.description: Watch Heart Attack, a Telugu Romantic Comedy Drama Film dubbed in Hindi; a film that starts in Goa with the henchmen of Don Makrand Kamati kidnapping a girl at the beach and turning her into a slave for sale after injecting drugs into her. When an honest police officer tries to bring to light their drug racket, they retaliate and beat him whilst continuing their dirty business. The focus then shifts to Varun, a vagabond who loves wandering all over the world. Calling himself a free soul, he earns his living by working in part-time jobs he finds in Craigslist. The twist in the tale takes place when Varun’s beau is kidnapped by the Makran’s men and he goes to retrieve her back from the clutches of these evil men. Will he successfully manage to get her out of this? Viu to find out!

item.title: Shootout At Wadala
